Footer.description: Digital Computer Training Academy is the best IT training academy in Gazipur, Dhaka, Bangladesh.

HeroSection.description: Digital Computer Training Academy is a platform where you can learn various technical courses. We provide the best quality courses for our students.

PopularCoursesSection.subtitle: Here are some of our popular courses. You can check these out! We offering a lot of courses also.
PopularCoursesSection.subtitle-2: Here are our all the courses that you can check out. We offer qualified courses for our students.

AboutSection.subtitle: The best IT training academy, Founded in 2009, providing various types of IT training in Manwa Chourasta, Sreepur, Gazipur.
AboutSection.description: Digital Computer Training Academy is an IT training academy founded in 2009. We are located in Mawna Chourasta, Sreepur, Gazipur. We have one branch. We are providing the training in Basic Computer Applications, Web Development, Graphic Design, Digital Marketing, etc. courses to our students.

SuccessStoriesSection.subtitle: Many students have achieved success by learning from us. Here are some of their stories.

InstructorsSection.subtitle: We have 20 instructors who are highly qualified and experienced in their respective fields. They are dedicated to providing the best training to our students.

ContactSection.subtitle: Have questions about our programs? Reach out to us and our team will get back to you shortly.
ContactSection.location-subtitle: Here is our location information with other information that helps you to find us.
ContactSection.address: 4th Floor, Yakub Ali Mobile Market, Mawna Chourasta, Sreepur, Gazipur
ContactSection.name: Name
ContactSection.subject: Subject
ContactSection.success-text: Your message has been sent successfully!
ContactSection.error-text: Failed to send your message. Please try again later.

MissionVisionSection.mission-text: To provide accessible, high-quality technology education that equips students with the skills, knowledge, and confidence needed to succeed in the rapidly evolving digital landscape.
MissionVisionSection.vision-text: To be the leading IT training institution, recognized for excellence in education, innovation in teaching methodologies, and producing graduates who are industry-ready and globally competitive.

CtaSection.title: Join Our Growing Community
CtaSection.description: Take the first step towards your new career in technology. Apply now for our upcoming courses.

HeroSection.description: Hear directly from our graduates about how our courses transformed their careers and lives. These success stories showcase the real-world impact of our training programs.

CtaSection.title: Write Your Own Success Story
CtaSection.description: Join our community of successful graduates. Apply now for our upcoming courses and start your journey toward a rewarding career in technology.

HeroSection.description: Have questions about our courses or admission process? We're here to help. Reach out to us using the contact form or through our contact information.

FaqSection.description: Find answers to common questions about contacting us and our response times. If not answered here, feel free to reach out.

CtaSection.title: Ready to Start Your Journey?
CtaSection.description: Take the first step towards your new career in technology. Apply now for our upcoming courses.

HeroSection.description: Explore our comprehensive range of courses designed to equip you with the skills needed in today's digital world.

CtaSection.title: Ready to Advance Your Skills?
CtaSection.description: Enrollment is now open for our upcoming sessions. Apply today to secure your spot and take the first step toward your new career.
CtaSection.card-subtitle: Call us to get advise from our academic advisors.
CtaSection.card-description: Our academic advisors can help you choose the right course based on your career goals, background, and interests.

HeroSection.description: Take the first step towards your new career by applying to our courses. Fill out the form below to get started.

StepsSection.subtitle: Our simple 3-step process to enroll in your desired course.
StepsSection.step-1-text: Choose your preferred course and batch timing.
StepsSection.step-2-text: Complete the application with your personal details.
StepsSection.step-3-text: Receive confirmation and wait for our response.

AdmissionSection.success-description: Thank you for your application! Our admissions team will review your information and get back to you shortly.
AdmissionSection.selection-description: Select your preferred course and batch timing.
AdmissionSection.information-description: Please provide your personal details below.
AdmissionSection.message-description: Share any additional information that might be relevant to your application.

CtaSection.title: Still Have Questions?
CtaSection.description: Our admissions team is here to help. Contact us for more information about our courses, admission process, or to schedule a campus visit.
